entry.title: Cookie Stovetop Simmer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Home Decor
Price: 20.40

Elevate the cozy atmosphere of your home in a new way‚ÄîLimited Edition Stovetop Simmers! ‚ÄúDo I Smell Cookies‚Äù Stovetop Simmer features festive, sweet, spicy fragrance notes to capture the delicious smell of homemade holiday treats. Sustainably sourced ingredients include: crystalized ginger, cinnamon, vanilla, star anise, cloves, nutmeg, cardamom, and almonds.¬†

This Stovetop Simmer is hand selected and filled by Dry Good Refillery in Montclair, NJ.¬†¬†

HOW TO USE: Simply pour the contents into a pot of water, simmer on low, and enjoy all day! The contents can be reused up to 3 times. When finished, the ingredients are compostable and the glass jar can be repurposed.¬†

Please note this product is NOT intended for consumption. Use only as intended.¬†

DIMENSIONS: 2‚Äù x 2‚Äù x 6‚Äù¬†

WEIGHT: 12 oz (340.19 g)¬†

entry.title: Rechargeable Electric Lighter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Accessory
Price: 18.00

Our Rechargeable Electric Lighter brings your candle game to the next level! ‚ö°üôå The lighter creates an electric arc at the push of a button that easily lights any candle wick with a flip of a switch, and recharges via micro-USB (included in a gift-worthy box!).

When clicked on, simply hold the arc on a candle wick for a couple of seconds to light candles! There is even a safety toggle that ensures the lighter only turns on when YOU need it. The long neck bends to reach into Mason jars perfectly. The battery is long-lasting and recharging is a matter of just a few minutes! A clear and easy-to-read LED gauge tells you how much charge you have left.

DIMENSIONS: 10" L x 3" W x 1" H

WEIGHT: 6 oz

Enjoy more unique candle accessories.

This product is intended for use with candles only. Please follow safety guidelines on box and do not touch the electric arc when ignited.

entry.title: White Candle Warmer Lamp
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Home Decor
Price: 42.00

Enjoy your favorite candle without the flame when you pair our¬†Mason Jar Candles with our NEW White Candle Warmer Lamp! This modern, elegant lamp is uniquely designed with ‚Äòtop-down‚Äô technology to create the cozy ambiance of a glowing candle, without the flame, while filling your space with your favorite smells.

Place your candle (up to 22 oz, or up to 6‚Äù tall) on the wooden base. We recommend using the 16 oz Mason Jar candle size for best results. Use the easy-flip switch on the cord to turn your lamp on and start melting the surface of your candle to release fragrance within minutes. Allow entire surface of candle to melt at least 0.5-1‚Äù before turning off. The same wax can be melted 2-3 times, then carefully dispose of melted wax to allow the un-melted, fragranced wax underneath to melt and freshen your space.

¬†

INCLUDES: NP5 Warming Bulb (25 W 120 V). 3 ft cord with easy-to-use on/off switch.

DIMENSIONS: 7.75‚Äù x 5.25‚Äù x 10.75‚Äù

¬†

Shop more Home D√©cor and Candle Looks in our d√©cor shop.

entry.title: Momma's Kitchen Gift Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Gift
Price: 55.00

Gifting just got easier with our Momma's Kitchen Gift Set!


Momma‚Äôs Kitchen is a warm and cozy blend of green apples, bright peach, and fresh pine, highlighted with a heart of cinnamon and notes of sweet balsamic spice. With up to 64 hours of burn time in our 16 oz candle, this spiced and bakey fragrance features a strong strength that captures the nostalgic aroma of homemade treats baked with love. Paired with our branded Wick Trimmer and an adorable Safety Matchbox.

Our candles are made in Lafayette, Indiana with natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans for a clean, long-lasting, and even burn. We use premium fragrance oils (hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.!) and 100% lead-free cotton wicks. All candles are paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free. This hand-picked fragrance is also phthalate and paraben free.

WEIGHT: 12.7 oz (359.2 g)

DIMENSIONS: 5‚Äù x 3‚Äù x 3‚Äù

Enjoy more unique candle accessories.

entry.title: Spice Cake by Karlee Gail Bowman Gift Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Gift
Price: 55.00

Gifting just got easier with our Spice Cake by Karlee Gail Bowman Gift Set!


Spice Cake by Karlee Gail Bowman is a cozy scent of spiced vanilla cake, intertwined with a warm, sweet medley of cinnamon, nutmeg, clove, ginger, and hazelnut. This fragrance is a one-of-a-kind creation in collaboration with our friend Karlee @karleegailbowman!

‚ÄúThis cozy candle takes me back to baking in my parent's kitchen. It's spicy with a dark molasses and hazelnut creme, with a splash of my homemade vanilla. It has a spice that fills the air. If I close my eyes while I smell it, I'm home.‚Äù

With up to 64 hours of burn time in our 16 oz candle, this spiced and bakey fragrance features a moderate strength that perfectly captures the nostalgic aroma of warm, spice cake baking in the oven. It is paired with our branded Wick Trimmer and an adorable Safety Matchbox.

Our candles are made in Lafayette, Indiana with natural soy wax from domestically grown soy beans for a clean, long-lasting, and even burn. We use premium fragrance oils (hand-picked by thousands of candle testers across the U.S.!) and 100% lead-free cotton wicks. All candles are paraffin free, dye free, and cruelty free. This hand-picked fragrance is also phthalate and paraben free.

WEIGHT: 12.7 oz (359.2 g)

DIMENSIONS: 5‚Äù x 3‚Äù x 3‚Äù

entry.title: Wick Dipper
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Accessory
Price: 12.00

Wick Dippers are a must-have for candle care! This stainless steel dipper combines luxury with utility and is a great tool to ensure you get the most out of your candle. Available in Black, Gold, or Silver.

A Wick Dipper is easy to use and allows you to safely extinguish a flame without smoke by carefully dipping it into the melted wax. This tool also allows you to adjust or re-center your candle wick if needed, and remove unwanted debris without a mess. Keeping your candle clean helps it continue to burn evenly from start to finish. That means longer lasting candles and more YUMMY smells!

Enjoy more unique candle accessories.

entry.title: Candle Gift Bag
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Gift
Price: 5.00

Nothing ties up the perfect gift like the CUTEST custom gift bag! Our Candle Gift Bag is the perfect addition to make your candle gift extra special!

Each cotton muslin bag is the perfect size for a Mason Jar candle (and a Candle Care accessory or two!). The bag also features a matching drawstring and unique Antique Candle Co.¬Æ design highlighting one of our favorite verses in Matthew 5:16, "let your light shine before others."

Enjoy more unique candle accessories.

entry.title: Wick Trimmer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Antique Candle Co.
Type: Accessory
Price: 18.00

Wick trimmers are a must-have for candle care! This¬†stainless steel Wick Trimmer is uniquely branded for your Antique Candle Co.¬Æ collection, combines luxury with utility, and is a great tool to ensure you get the most out of your candle. It is heavy duty yet lightweight to make trimming quick and easy. The round blades are ideal for making clean cuts and catching excess trimmings. Available in Black, Gold, or Silver.

Trimming your candle wick to 1/4" - 1/2" after each burn keeps your candle clean and helps it continue to burn evenly from start to finish. That means longer lasting candles and more YUMMY smells!

Enjoy more unique candle accessories.

Extinguishing the flame of your candle after each burn with a candle snuffer keeps your candle clean and helps it continue to burn evenly from start to finish. That means longer lasting candles and more YUMMY smells!
